name: Voimaosakeyhtiö SF
goal: Voimaosakeyhtiö SF is Finnish Fennovoima’s majority shareholder. Fennovoima is constructing new nuclear power in order to produce reasonably priced electricity for Finnish businesses and for Finnish households, help Finland move towards energy self-sufficiency and increase competition in electricity markets.
euInitiatives:
Regulation and policies concerning nuclear power
Energy, climate and environmental policies
